participant_1.name: Helal
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, eager to explore life outside the confines of home.
participant_1.background: I'm 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King. I just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Clara
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and cultured, she finds joy in the beauty of nature and literature.
participant_2.background: I grow roses in my garden. I have a big library at home. I'm a museum tour guide. I love to drink fancy tea.
